SEARCH
Package com.tloj.game.entities

Class CombatEntity

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.entities.Entity
com.tloj.game.entities.CombatEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Character, Mob
public abstract class CombatEntity extends Entity
An abstract class representing an entity that can either attack and be attacked
This includes the Character (the player), the Mobs and the Bosses
All combat entities have a health pool, an attack stat and a defense stat
